text: Nígbà tí àwọn Òjíṣẹ́ wọn wá bá wọn níwájú wọn àti lẹ́yìn wọn, (wọ́n sọ) pé: "Ẹ̀yin kò gbọdọ̀ jọ́sìn fún ẹnì kan àfi Allāhu." Wọ́n wí pé: "Tí ó bá jẹ́ pé Olúwa wa bá fẹ́ ni, ìbá sọ mọlāika kalẹ̀ (fún ìpèpè yìí). Dájúdájú àwa jẹ́ aláìgbàgbọ́ nínú ohun tí Wọ́n fi ran yín níṣẹ́
